events.message: The applicant has successfully submitted their personal loan application online to cover upcoming medical expenses.
The loan application was reviewed and categorized under personal loan due to keywords such as 'medical' and 'debt' mentioned.
A specific loan officer was assigned to handle the personal loan application and reach out for further queries.
The loan officer conducted an initial review of the documentation and preliminary information provided by the applicant.
Additional documents such as medical bills, income proof, and ID verification were requested to proceed with the application.
The applicant promptly submitted all the requested documents including bank statements and prescriptions for review.
A credit check was performed on the applicant, revealing a stable credit history with manageable existing debts.
Risk assessment evaluated the likelihood of repayment based on credit scores and debt-to-income ratio of the applicant.
An offer for a personal loan with a competitive interest rate and flexible repayment terms was presented to the applicant.
The applicant provided positive feedback on the offer and requested to proceed with loan approval as soon as possible.
The application was escalated to senior management for expedited approval given the urgency of the medical treatment.
The personal loan application was formally approved after review of all documentation and risk assessments.
The approved personal loan funds were disbursed directly into the applicantâ€™s bank account for medical expenses.
A follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant has received the funds and to offer any assistance for repayment scheduling.
The loan case was successfully closed following completion of disbursal and all necessary follow-up activities.
